member.name: M:Rocket.Core.Permissions.ConfigurationPermissionProvider.BuildPermissionTree(System.String)
member.summary:
Builds a parent permission tree for the given permission
If the target has any of these permissions, they will automatically have the given permission too
Example Input:
"player.test.sub"
Example output:
[ "*", "player.*", "player.test.*", "player.test.sub" ]
member.param: The permission to build the tree for
member.returns: The collection of all parent permission nodes
